column4: if noone responds to question, is it bad etiquette to ask again?

ok, repeating, x won't start because it says that there is an api mismatch, the nvidia driver is 7xxx and the x one is 6111. I used synaptic to downgrade my nvidia-glx package to get gl-dpeendent stuff to work.
i had a similar problem with suse 9.1 and was never able to fix it... hence one of the reasons i ended up switching to ubuntu
it screwed up my entire display.. and that was from the official Yast online update!
